Story

----------

An archaeologist named Sir John Chapman has been looking for a mythological city named City of the Caesars. Sir Chapman spend most his life searching for this city like his father did. After finding a major clue of where the city could be located, he sets on an expedition which ends up terribly, the plane that Sir Chapman was on, ended up crashing in middle of mountains in an unknown region to him. He battles for his survival, trying to escape the mountains, that he ended up on.

Features 

------------

-Local tribe that's hunting you down (Not implemented)

-Build tools to survive (Not implemented)

-Build structures to stay safe from the outside world  (Not implemented)

-Collect radio parts in order to escape (Not implemented)

-Day and weather cycle (In Development)

-Hunting for animals for food (In Development)
